# 10.0 Docs

- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/composite-mldsa-draft-08.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where CompositeMLDsa was updated from draft-07 to draft-08 of the Composite ML-DSA for use in X.509 Public Key Infrastructure specification.
- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/cosesigner-key-null.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where CoseSigner.Key may now be null when backed by Post-Quantum Cryptography algorithms.
- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/mldsa-slhdsa-secretkey-to-privatekey.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where MLDsa and SlhDsa members were renamed from using 'SecretKey' to using 'PrivateKey'.
- [Breaking change: OpenSSL cryptographic primitives not supported on macOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/openssl-macos-unsupported.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where OpenSSL cryptographic primitives are no longer supported on macOS.
- [Breaking change: .NET 10 requires OpenSSL 1.1.1 or later on Unix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/openssl-version-requirement.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where OpenSSL 1.1.1 or later is required on Unix platforms.
- [Breaking change: Environment variable renamed to DOTNET_OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/version-override.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in .NET cryptography where the environment variable CLR_OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE was renamed to DOTNET_OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE.
- [Breaking change: X500DistinguishedName validation is stricter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/x500distinguishedname-validation.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in cryptography where X500DistinguishedName validation is stricter.
- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/10.0/x509-publickey-null.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where key parameters in X509Certificate and PublicKey can be null.
